full_summary:
=====================================

**Request for Proposal: Portable Greenhouse Gas Analyzers**
----------------------------------------------------------

### TENDER INFORMATION

* **Tender Reference:** WS4006531620
* **Publication Date:** September 12, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** October 3, 2023, at 14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Commencement Date:** October 31, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date:** August 18, 2024

### PROCUREMENT DETAILS

* **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

### TRADE AGREEMENTS

This tender is open to bidders who have a valid agreement under the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement

### REGIONS OF DELIVERY

The tender requires delivery to the following regions:

* Canada
* Saskatchewan
* Alberta

### CONTRACTING ENTITY INFORMATION

* **Contracting Entity Name:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contracting Entity Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5, Canada

### CONTACT INFORMATION

* **Contact Name:** Stephen Van Den Hanenberg
* **Contact Email:** stephen.vandenhanenberg@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### NOTICE URL

The tender notice can be accessed through the following URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17427584?extsite=MTc0Mjc1ODRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Please ensure to submit your proposal in accordance with the tender requirements and deadlines. Any questions or concerns should be directed to the
